thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 55 of 579
thread.title: Joanna Crane Crane
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Joanna Crane Crane

author: Joanna Crane Crane
title: Joanna Crane Crane
text: I've loved every purchase I've made from the quality to the comfort to the way it looks on me. Just ordered 2 items on sale and my points saved me so much that I spent less for 2 than what the one item cost on sale Normally I wish the leggings were about $10 cheaper since I have to pay shipping which is why I buy during huge sales or when I get a bonus. Please bring a physical store to a mall in northern Indiana! I would buy way more often. Always pleased with your products. Keep it up!
